subject: CLASS_PATH
msgSnippet: I m having problems getting JUnit to work. I followed the directions about the CLASS_PATH... I figured out that Windows and/or Java is not honoring my
messageBody:
I'm having problems getting JUnit to work. I followed the directions
about the CLASS_PATH...

I figured out that Windows and/or Java is not honoring my CLASS_PATH
environment variable, no matter what I put in it.

Does anyone here know why my CLASS_PATH has no effect? (And yes, I
know that you much close/reopen the cmd window after changing this
variable.)

Thanks.

Matt
